thread.title: London in 2016
thread.title_full: London in 2016 - Review of Ham Yard Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: amoptbddwn
title: London in 2016
text: We think fondly of the Ham Yard hotel and cannot wait to return next year. We stayed there in the summer of 2016 and brought back many great memories of our excellent experience. The food is so good we almost never went anywhere else, concierge recommended the perfect Italian bistro when we finally did leave the property. Everyone from the bellman, to the maid, to the room, to the front desk staff and room service was better than we could expect. The location is central to many sites in central London as well.
